title: Shortcuts keep deleting from homepage after 1 day. Quick calls, Spotify playlists, etc disappearing.
content: Started about a month ago. I have quick call shortcuts from my contacts, Spotify playlist shortcuts, and some Settings shortcuts on my homepage. I keep replacing the shortcuts when they disappear, then within about a day they all disappear from my homepage. Anyone else experiencing this?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
